<h3>How to run for first time?</h3>

```
pkg install python git

git clone https://github.com/AitzazImtiaz/Bad-Boy

cd Bad-Boy

ls

make install

badboy
```
Badboy is coming on pip now! Install using:
```
pip install badboy
```
